references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for text-based image editing, which is highly relevant to the drag-based image editing approach of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superiority of diffusion models over GANs in image generation, which is fundamental to the drag-based image editing approach of the target paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image synthesis method based on latent diffusion models, which is the foundation for the FastDrag method in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Drag your GAN: Interactive point-based manipulation on the generative image manifold
references.reason: This paper introduces a drag-based image editing method using GANs, which is a key reference for the target paper's comparison and analysis of drag-based editing methods.

references.paper_title: DragDiffusion: Harnessing diffusion models for interactive point-based image editing
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the target paper because it is a direct comparison and competitor using diffusion models for drag-based image editing.
